q2: Did you see the Liverpool game?
q3: I did not watch the game, sorry
a3: it is an live web site
q4: Did you see the new player?
a4: After the goalkeeping mistakes in the final last year I’m ready to see the new record singing Allison.
q5: It will be interesting to see how Allison translates to the premier league under Klopp.
a5: Allison looked very promising in the World Cup and should do well in red.
q6: I think he was too expensive.
a6: Do you think he will help us have a winning session?
